类 MatchesRDD

  • 所有已实现的接口:
    java.io.Serializable, org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDDLike<Match,​org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD<Match>>, scala.Serializable
    public class MatchesRDD
extends org.apache.spark.api.java.JavaRDD<Match>
    A MatchesRDD instance stores a collection of matches to a partial pattern as an RDD.
    另请参阅:

        参数:

    • 方法详细资料

      • join

        public MatchesRDD join​(MatchesRDD other)
        The method `join()` computes the joining results of two MatchesRDD instances, result is returned as a new MatchesRDD instance. For instance, in the example of assignment description, the matches of edge pattern (u1, u2) and (u1, u3) are as follows. |u1 u2 | |u1 u3| ----- meta data ---| |------| |-----| ---| |v2 v3 | |v2 v4| --| ---|-- MatchesRDD instance |v3 v4 | |v4 v5| --|-- collection of `Match` ---| |v5 v3 | | | --| ---| The result of join should be |u1 u2 u3| |--------| |v2 v3 v4| | |
        参数:
        other - another `MatchesRDD` instance
        返回:
        a new `MatchesRDD` according to the join
